scripts.postdeploy: unset PYTHONHOME && unset PYTHONPATH && ansible-galaxy install mako-ai.facebook-messenger && ansible-playbook -i ansible/inventory ansible/site.yml
scripts.pr-predestroy: unset PYTHONHOME && unset PYTHONPATH && ansible-playbook -e "{'user': {'id': '$FACEBOOK_USER_ID'}}" -i ansible/inventory --tags destroy ansible/site.yml
